allSaves.value: +1 status on all saves vs. poison

description.value: The blade of this footâ€‘long knife curves inward and lacks a cross guard at the hilt.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 2d6 persistent acid damage, and 2 acid splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 2d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 2*(2d6) #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}

description.value:
Activate A Strike

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals 2d6 electricity damage and 2 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes flat-footed until the start of your next turn. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

rules.text: Effect: Target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of my next turn.

description.value:
The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 2d6 cold damage and 2 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.

rules.text: Effect: Target takes a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds.

description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Crafting alchemical item
  • +1 item bonus to attack rolls with bombs
[[/r 2d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}, and [[/r 5 #splash acid]]{5 acid splash} damage

description.value: [[/r 5 #splash cold]]{5 cold splash} damage and the targeted creature takes a -10 penalty to all speeds until the end of the target's next turn.

rules.text: {item|name}[[/r 5 #splash cold]]{5 cold splash} damage and the targeted creature takes a -10 penalty to all speeds until the end of the target's next turn.

description.value: Each alchemist carries 2 infused moderate acid flasks, 2 infused moderate bottled lightnings, and 2 infused moderate frost vials. These items last for 24 hours or until the next time the alchemists make their daily preparations.
The alchemist draws an alchemical bomb with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike.
The alchemist's @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist Goggles]{Alchemist Goggles} allow them to ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.
The alchemist deals 5 splash damage with thrown alchemical bombs rather than the normal amount.
If the alchemist's Strike hits a flatfooted creature, they deal [[/r 1d6 # extra precision damage]]{1d6 extra precision} damage.
